Black Heather is a member of the leading trio of Bandits in the Wilderness Bandit Camp in levels 24-31 of the Wilderness, along with Donny the lad and Speedy Keith. She, like the other two leaders, wields a steel scimitar.

If players attempt to talk to her, they will receive a message stating, "Black Heather is not interested in talking."
